post.description: Allows a new user to register by providing necessary details such as name, email, password, and role. Upon successful registration, an access token is returned for authentication.
Authenticates a user by validating their credentials (email/phone/username and password). If successful, an access token is returned for subsequent authenticated requests.
Logs out the currently authenticated user by invalidating their access token. This ensures that the token can no longer be used for authenticated requests.

put.description: Update the details of the currently authenticated user.

email.description: Required when phone is not provided. Must be a valid email address.

phone.description: Required when email is not provided. Must be a valid phone number.

password.description: Must be at least 4 characters long.

email.description: User email (required if phone is not provided)

phone.description: User phone number (required if email is not provided). Must be a valid phone number starting with '09' and followed by 8 digits.

student.description: Student details (required if role is student)

universityId.description: University ID (must exist in universities table)

teacher.description: Teacher details (required if role is teacher)

phone.description: Teacher phone number (must be a valid phone number starting with '09' and followed by 8 digits).

timeTaked.description: The time taken to complete the quiz

complete.description: Indicates if the task is complete

lastTime.description: The last recorded time in HH:MM format

phone.description: The phone number of the user

birth.description: The birth date of the student

id.description: The unique identifier of the answer

correct.description: Indicates if the answer is correct

id.description: The unique identifier for the course

summary.description: A brief summary of the course
summary.example: Learn the basics of Laravel framework

studentsCount.description: The number of students enrolled in the course

createdAt.description: The date and time when the course was created

teachers.description: List of teachers associated with the course

images.description: List of images associated with the course

quizezPercent.description: The percentage of quizzes completed by the student

lecturesPercent.description: The percentage of lectures completed by the student

discount.description: The discount applied to the course

year.description: The year the course was created

time.description: The duration of the course in hours

quizezCount.description: The number of quizzes in the course

filesCount.description: The number of files associated with the course

id.description: The ID of the course session

title.description: The title of the course session

note.description: Additional notes for the course session

time.description: The time of the course session

like.description: The number of likes for the course session

dislike.description: The number of dislikes for the course session

type.description: The type of the course session

isFree.description: Indicates if the course session is free

video.description: The video media associated with the course session

MediaResource.title: MediaResource
MediaResource.description: Media resource representation for files and images

name.description: Name of the media file without extension

collection.description: Collection name where the media is stored

url.description: Full URL to access the media file

caption.description: Caption or description of the media. Falls back to name if not set

width.description: Width of the image in pixels (only for images)

height.description: Height of the image in pixels (only for images)

thumbnailUrl.description: URL of the thumbnail version. Only present if 'thumb' conversion exists

answers.description: The answers associated with the question

note.description: Additional notes or comments for the question

time.description: The time allocated for the quiz in minutes

id.description: The unique identifier of the review

rating.description: The rating given in the review

created_at.description: The date when the review was created

id.description: The unique identifier of the student quiz

solvedQuestions.description: The number of questions solved by the student

totalQuestions.description: The total number of questions in the quiz

timeTaked.description: The time taken by the student to complete the quiz

id.description: The unique identifier of the subject

year.description: The academic year of the subject

semester.description: The semester in which the subject is taught

university.description: The university associated with the subject

quizezCounts.description: The count of quizzes associated with the subject

questionsCount.description: The count of questions associated with the subject

createdAt.description: The date when the teacher was created

reviewsCount.description: The number of reviews for the teacher

studentsCount.description: The number of students for the teacher

coursesCount.description: The number of courses for the teacher

id.description: The unique identifier of the university
